thread.title: Leggie Amit Mishra booked in sexual assault case, summoned for questioning - newsR
thread.title_full: Leggie Amit Mishra booked in sexual assault case, summoned for questioning - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Leggie Amit Mishra booked in sexual assault case, summoned for questioning - newsR
text:
*Bengaluru: *Team India cricketer Amit Mishra was on Tuesday summoned by Bengaluru police for questioning after he was booked for alleged sexual assault of a woman in his hotel room here last month, police said.
"We have shot off a notice, summoning India cricketer Amit Mishra for allegedly sexually assaulting a woman in ... Â»
